content:
HelloTalk is a fantastic app for language exchange, and it's wonderful that you've heard good things about it from friends!

Yes, HelloTalk does allow you to filter language exchange partners by location. Here's how you can do it:

1. Open HelloTalk and tap on the "Find Language Partners" tab at the bottom of the screen.
2. Tap on the "Filters" button at the top right corner of the screen.
3. Scroll down to the "Location" section and tap on "Add Location".
4. Type in "Tokyo" or "Japan" to find language exchange partners based in Tokyo or Japan.
5. You can also select a specific distance radius, such as 10 km or 50 km, to find partners who are closer to you.
6. Tap "Apply" to apply the filters and see a list of language exchange partners who match your criteria.

You can also use the "Search" function to find language exchange partners in Tokyo. Simply type in keywords like "Tokyo", "Japan", or "Japanese" in the search bar, and HelloTalk will show you a list of users who have mentioned these keywords in their profiles.

Additionally, you can also use the "Community" feature in HelloTalk to join groups related to Tokyo or Japan, where you can connect with other users who share similar interests or locations.

Remember to always be respectful and considerate when reaching out to language exchange partners, and don't hesitate to ask them about their language level, interests, or availability for language exchange.

Good luck, and I hope you find a great language exchange partner in Tokyo!
